mapper.select: SELECT A.MEM_ID, A.INVITE_CD, B.FST_INPUT_DTM AS QUS_DTM, B.QUST_ID, B.CATE_ID, F.CATE_NM, D.QUST_CN, C.ANS_CN, C.ANS_DTM FROM SD_MEMBER AS A LEFT JOIN SD_SEND_DETLSD AS B ON A.INVITE_CD = B.INVITE_CD LEFT JOIN SD_ANSWER AS C ON B.QUST_ID = C.QUST_ID AND B.CATE_ID = C.CATE_ID AND B.INVITE_CD=C.INVITE_CD AND A.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN SD_QUESTION AS D ON B.QUST_ID = D.QUST_ID AND B.CATE_ID = D.CATE_ID LEFT JOIN SD_CATEGORY AS F ON F.CATE_ID = D.CATE_ID WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{Mem_id} AND A.INVITE_CD = #{Invite_cd} ORDER BY B.FST_INPUT_DTM DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS FAMILY_NUM FROM SD_MEMBER WHERE INVITE_CD = #{Invite_cd}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS ANS_NUM FROM SD_SEND_DETLSD AS A LEFT JOIN SD_ANSWER AS B ON A.CATE_ID = B.CATE_ID AND A.QUST_ID=B.QUST_ID AND A.INVITE_CD=B.INVITE_CD WHERE A.CATE_ID =#{Cate_id} AND A.QUST_ID=#{Qust_id} AND B.ANS_CN IS NOT NULL
SELECT A.QUST_ID, A.CATE_ID, A.QUST_CN FROM SD_QUESTION A JOIN SD_SEND_DETLSD B ON A.QUST_ID = B.QUST_ID AND A.CATE_ID = B.CATE_ID WHERE B.INVITE_CD = #{invite_cd} AND B.ARRIVE_DTM = #{date}

SELECT B.NICK_NM,A.ANS_CN,A.ANS_DTM FROM SD_ANSWER A JOIN SD_MEMBER B ON A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID AND A.INVITE_CD = B.INVITE_CD WHERE A.QUST_ID =#{qust_id} AND A.CATE_ID = #{cate_id} AND A.INVITE_CD = #{invite_cd}
